words.word_translated: Pornhub, a popular website for adult content.

words.sentence_translated: He found a porn film on Pornhub.

words.word_translated: To sit or to be satiated (used as 'to fill up').
words.sentence_translated: The folder was filled with a book series.

words.word_translated: To name or to call something.
words.sentence: Hij noemt het een vrij werk.

words.word_translated: Free, as in not bound by obligations.
Lesbian, relating to women who are attracted to other women.

words.sentence_translated: The lesbian relationship is enough at the same time.
They read a book series at the same time.

words.sentence: Hij heeft meestal een map op zijn kantoor.
words.sentence_translated: He usually has a folder on his desk.

words.word_translated: A book series, a set of books with related content.
words.sentence: De boeketreeks is meestal vrij te krijgen.

words.word_translated: Folder or map, used for organizing documents.
words.sentence: Ik gebruik een map voor boeketreeks.
words.sentence_translated: I use a folder for the book series.
